creator: frantz.dvpt@free.fr

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
This works for me. Please verify that your installation is clean (and that you
don't have another servlet.jar in the system classpath, or something similar).
If you are sure this is a bug, please explain how to reproduce the issue.
